SEARCH
Package getumbrellad.models.exceptions

Class Player

java.lang.Object
getumbrellad.models.exceptions.Character
getumbrellad.models.exceptions.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Spawnable
public class Player extends Character implements Spawnable
Represents the controllable player in the game. The Player can move, jump, collect items, interact with NPCs, apply upgrades, and puts the data to a file. It also handles physics, collision, and animation logic.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name, int hp, int damage, int money, int currentLevel)
      Constructs a Player.
      Parameters:
      name - player name
      hp - initial health
      damage - damage value (always 0 because pacifist)
      money - starting money
      currentLevel - starting level

    • Player

      public Player(String fileName, LevelGameplayGUI lggui) throws PlayerNotFoundException
      Constructs a Player through CSV file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the file name to read player data from
      lggui - the game panel
      Throws:
      PlayerNotFoundException - if file cannot be found

    • checkAllCollisions

      public void checkAllCollisions()
      Checks for collisions with all entities with Player: bullets, coins, NPCs. Applies the necessary consequences (damage, money, shop interaction).
